verses.verse: וַיִּתְפַּלֵּ֣ל <WH6419> vai-yit-pal-Lel prayed יוֹנָ֔ה <WH3124> yo-Nah, Then Jonah אֶל־ <WH413> 'el- to יְהוָ֖ה <WH3068> Yah-weh unto the LORD אֱלֹהָ֑יו <WH430> 'e-lo-Hav; his God מִמְּעֵ֖י <WH4578> mi-me-'Ei belly הַדָּגָֽה׃ <WH1710> had-da-Gah. out of the fish's

וַיֹּ֗אמֶר <WH559> vai-Yo-mer, And said קָ֠רָאתִי <WH7121> Ka-ra-ti I cried מִצָּ֥רָה <WH6869> mitz-Tza-rah by reason of mine affliction לִ֛י li אֶל־ <WH413> 'el- to יְהוָ֖ה <WH3068> Yah-weh unto the LORD וַֽיַּעֲנֵ֑נִי <WH6030> vai-ya-'a-Ne-ni; and he heard מִבֶּ֧טֶן <WH990> mib-Be-ten me out of the belly שְׁא֛וֹל <WH7585> she-'ol of hell שִׁוַּ֖עְתִּי <WH7768> shiv-Va'-ti cried שָׁמַ֥עְתָּ <WH8085> sha-Ma'-ta I [and] thou heardest קוֹלִֽי׃ <WH6963> ko-Li. my voice

וַתַּשְׁלִיכֵ֤נִי <WH7993> vat-tash-li-Che-ni For thou hadst cast מְצוּלָה֙ <WH4688> me-tzu-Lah me into the deep בִּלְבַ֣ב <WH3824> bil-Vav in the midst יַמִּ֔ים <WH3220> yam-Mim, of the seas וְנָהָ֖ר <WH5104> ve-na-Har and the floods יְסֹבְבֵ֑נִי <WH5437> ye-soe-Ve-ni; compassed כָּל־ <WH3605> kol- All מִשְׁבָּרֶ֥יךָ <WH4867> mish-ba-Rei-cha me about all thy billows וְגַלֶּ֖יךָ <WH1530> ve-gal-Lei-cha and thy waves עָלַ֥י <WH5921> 'a-Lai over עָבָֽרוּ׃ <WH5674> 'a-Va-ru. passed over

וַאֲנִ֣י <WH589> va-'a-Ni I אָמַ֔רְתִּי <WH559> 'a-Mar-ti, Then I said נִגְרַ֖שְׁתִּי <WH1644> nig-Rash-ti I am cast out מִנֶּ֣גֶד <WH5048> min-Ne-ged from עֵינֶ֑יךָ <WH5869> 'ei-Nei-cha; of thy sight אַ֚ךְ <WH389> 'ach Nevertheless אוֹסִ֣יף <WH3254> o-Sif again לְהַבִּ֔יט <WH5027> le-hab-Bit, yet I will look אֶל־ <WH413> 'el- toward הֵיכַ֖ל <WH1964> hei-Chal temple קָדְשֶֽׁךָ׃ <WH6944> kod-She-cha toward thy holy

אֲפָפ֤וּנִי <WH661> 'a-fa-Fu-ni compassed me about מַ֙יִם֙ <WH4325> ma-yim The waters עַד־ <WH5704> 'ad- to the point נֶ֔פֶשׁ <WH5315> Ne-fesh, [even] to the soul תְּה֖וֹם <WH8415> te-Hom the depth יְסֹבְבֵ֑נִי <WH5437> ye-soe-Ve-ni; closed me round about ס֖וּף <WH5488> suf the weeds חָב֥וּשׁ <WH2280> cha-Vush were wrapped about לְרֹאשִֽׁי׃ <WH7218> le-ro-Shi. my head

לְקִצְבֵ֤י <WH7095> le-kitz-Vei to the bottoms הָרִים֙ <WH2022> ha-Rim of the mountains יָרַ֔דְתִּי <WH3381> ya-Rad-ti, I went down הָאָ֛רֶץ <WH776> ha-'A-retz the earth בְּרִחֶ֥יהָ <WH1280> be-ri-Chei-ha with her bars בַעֲדִ֖י <WH1157> va-'a-Di around לְעוֹלָ֑ם <WH5769> le-'o-Lam; [was] about me for ever וַתַּ֧עַל <WH5927> vat-Ta-'al yet hast thou brought up מִשַּׁ֛חַת <WH7845> mish-Sha-chat from corruption חַיַּ֖י <WH2416> chai-Yai my life יְהוָ֥ה <WH3068> Yah-weh O LORD אֱלֹהָֽי׃ <WH430> 'e-lo-Hai. my God

בְּהִתְעַטֵּ֤ף <WH5848> be-hit-'at-Tef fainted עָלַי֙ <WH5921> 'a-Lai When נַפְשִׁ֔י <WH5315> naf-Shi, When my soul אֶת־ <WH853> 'et- יְהוָ֖ה <WH3069> Yah-weh God זָכָ֑רְתִּי <WH2142> za-Cha-re-ti; within me I remembered וַתָּב֤וֹא <WH935> vat-ta-Vo came in אֵלֶ֙יךָ֙ <WH413> 'e-Lei-cha and תְּפִלָּתִ֔י <WH8605> te-fil-la-Ti, and my prayer אֶל־ <WH413> 'el- about הֵיכַ֖ל <WH1964> hei-Chal temple קָדְשֶֽׁךָ׃ <WH6944> kod-She-cha unto thee into thine holy

מְשַׁמְּרִ֖ים <WH8104> me-sham-me-Rim They that observe הַבְלֵי־ <WH1892> hav-lei- vanities שָׁ֑וְא <WH7723> Shav; lying חַסְדָּ֖ם <WH2617> chas-Dam their own mercy יַעֲזֹֽבוּ׃ <WH5800> ya-'a-Zou. forsake

וַאֲנִ֗י <WH589> va-'a-Ni, I בְּק֤וֹל <WH6963> be-Kol unto thee with the voice תּוֹדָה֙ <WH8426> to-Dah of thanksgiving אֶזְבְּחָה־ <WH2076> 'ez-be-chah- But I will sacrifice לָּ֔ךְ Lach, אֲשֶׁ֥ר <WH834> 'a-Sher which נָדַ֖רְתִּי <WH5087> na-Dar-ti [that] that I have vowed אֲשַׁלֵּ֑מָה <WH7999> 'a-shal-Le-mah; I will pay יְשׁוּעָ֖תָה <WH3444> ye-shu-'A-tah Salvation לַיהוָֽה׃ <WH3068> Yah-weh. [is] of the LORD ס sa-Mek

וַיֹּ֥אמֶר <WH559> vai-Yo-mer spake יְהוָ֖ה <WH3068> Yah-weh And the LORD לַדָּ֑ג <WH1709> lad-Dag; unto the fish וַיָּקֵ֥א <WH6958> vai-ya-Ke and it vomited out אֶת־ <WH853> 'et- יוֹנָ֖ה <WH3124> yo-Nah Jonah אֶל־ <WH413> 'el- onto הַיַּבָּשָֽׁה׃ <WH3004> hai-yab-ba-Shah. upon the dry פ Peh
